title: Pilot
description: New cadets arrive at the Metropolitan Police Academy, now under the leadership of Commandant Hefilfinger. The cadets must rescue their hard-nosed instructor Sgt. Ledbetter, after he is kidnapped by a biker gang.

title: Put Down That Nose
description: Worried about a former cadet threatening to assassinate the Commandant, Ledbetter undergoes a psychiatric evaluation.

title: Ain't Nothin' But a Hound
description: In a training exercise staged for the cadets, Casey plays the role of a criminal on the loose. But confusion arises when a Casey look-alike escapes from prison. The Tackleberrys adopt a pet pig.

title: Two Men and a Baby
description: The arrival of a filmmaker filming a recruitment video gives Ledbetter the opportunity to record proof of Casey's shenanigans. The Tackleberrys care for an infant left at their door.

title: Dead Man Talking
description: A photographer with incriminating evidence is brought to the Academy for protection. District Attorney Callahan has feelings for Commandant Hefilfinger.

title: Mummy Dearest
description: Expecting a delivery of an exercise bicycle, the Commandant receives an Egyptian mummy instead. In an attempt to impress her strict father, Annie pretends to be a drill instructor.

title: No Sweat, Sweet
description: An over-the-hill boxer enrols in the Academy to toughen up. Casey must find out who has been stealing the cadets' personal belongings.

title: All at Sea
description: While on a stakeout at the beach, Casey becomes involved with an attractive TV star, who is kidnapped. Annie fears she may have a curse, and visits a psychic for help.

title: Les Is More
description: Casey is stalked by a woman obsessed with marrying him, just as romance is blossoming between Casey and Annie. After a knock to the head, Lester develops multiple-personality disorder.

title: If I Were a Rich Cop
description: Casey finds an ancient journal with clues to a buried treasure on Academy grounds. Annie is upset when Casey cheats on his written assignments.

title: Shopping with the Enemy
description: With the cancellation of summer vacation, Hefilfinger and the cadets try to get their Christmas shopping in early, but find themselves held captive by a group of inept thugs.

title: Luke...Warm
description: Annie has a secret admirer in Luke, but the feeling is not quite mutual. The Tackleberrys are hot on the trail of some missing squad cars.

title: The Truth Ain't What It Used to Be
description: Police Academy court is in session. With Hefilfinger as judge, and Ledbetter as prosecutor, Casey is put on trial for allegedly assisting a bank robber.

title: Hoop Nightmares
description: In an attempt to raise money for Annie's surprise birthday party, Casey bets on the annual basketball game between the Academy's and Sheriff's cadets.

title: Lend Me Your Ears
description: Eric Lassard comes out of retirement to fill in as Commandant, while Hefilfinger takes a refresher course. Ledbetter experiments with a new hair-growth treatment.

title: Dr. Hightower
description: Captain Hightower returns to the Academy to train the new cadets, and to receive an award as "Alumnus of the Year". He also lends Casey a helping hand in tracking down an armored car thief.

title: Bring Me the Turtle of Commandant Hefilfinger
description: The Commandant's pet turtle, Zeus, becomes possessed by a creature from outer space. Ledbetter attempts an Academy takeover. Lester teams up with Cassandra to catch a thief.

title: Karate Cops
description: The cadets are led to a couple of jewel thieves, after Commandant Hefilfinger finds a ruby in his fortune cookie.

title: A Horse of Course
description: When Lester's new equine friend becomes kidnapped, it's up to Casey and the cadets to find and return the horse to its rightful owner.

title: Mr. I.Q.
description: Lester joins a dating service, using Casey's photo on his profile. Jones tutors the cadets on how to detect a pickpocket. Luke becomes a game show contestant.

title: Team Tack
description: When Captain Tackleberry shuts down a strip club, he is set up for blackmail by the club owner. Ledbetter orders Casey to help Luke lose some weight.

title: Cadet of the Year
description: Ledbetter does his best to keep Casey from winning a Cadet of the Year competition, organised by Hefilfinger to increase the number of Academy enlistments. Due to budget cuts, Commissioner Hurst is now the new Commandant.

title: Got Insurance?
description: The Academy's janitor files a lawsuit, after Luke accidentally injures him. Casey tries to defend the Academy against the janitor's shady lawyer.

title: Angel on My Back
description: Ledbetter meets his guardian angel, who tells him to start treating his cadets with kindness or be doomed.

title: Lend Me Your Neck
description: Annie is stalked by a mental patient who thinks he is a vampire. A woman turns up at the Academy, claiming to be Hefilfinger's daughter.

title: Rich No More
description: Ledbetter and the cadets embark on a ski trip for winter break. Alice & Annie have the hots for a handsome concierge. The Tackleberrys try befriending Lester. Casey meets the love of his life, but has trouble being accepted by her father.
